entries.property: You can't attune to other magic items while you're attuned to the artifact; when you become attuned, your attunement to other items ends immediately.
When you become attuned to the artifact, a random ability score is reduced by 2 (minimum 3); Greater Restoration restores the ability.
When you become attuned to the artifact, you take 8d10 Psychic damage.
The first time you become attuned to the artifact, it gives you a quest determined by the DM; you can't use any of its properties until you complete the quest.
Each time you become attuned, there is a 10% chance you attract a god's attention; an avatar (Empyrean stat block) comes to wrest the artifact and vanishes once it obtains it.
Each time you become attuned, you must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution save or die; if you die, you transform into a Wight under the DM's control that must protect the artifact.
The artifact dilutes potions within 10 feet of itself, rendering them nonmagical.
The artifact erases scrolls within 10 feet of itself, rendering them nonmagical.
While you're attuned to the artifact, creatures of a particular type other than Humanoid (DM's choice) are always hostile toward you.
While you're attuned to the artifact, you have vulnerability to all damage.
The artifact imprisons a Death Slaad; each time you become attuned, there is a 10% chance it escapes and attacks you.
While attuned to the artifact, you can't spend Hit Point Dice or regain Hit Points.
